ISSUE.TITLE: RenderCheckbox values should not be limited to Id property
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 When we use RenderCheckBox in datatable then we have to use Id as property to bind value because of then ``` case RenderCheckBox checkBox: <text> render: function (data, type, row, meta) { return (data === 'true') ? '<input name="@checkBox.Name" value="' + row.Id + '" type="checkbox" class="checkboxGroups" checked="checked" />' : '<input name="@checkBox.Name" value="' + row.Id + '" type="checkbox" class="checkboxGroups" />'; }, </text> break; ``` in _Table.Definition.cshtml. I think, it should not be limited to Id property. There should be another parameter pass from RenederCheckBox to use in row.PropertyName. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/70653/rendercheckbox-values-should-not-be-limited-to-id-property.aspx#242687
